name: Traffic Jam (Knocktane, EOShadows)
description:
This is the game "Traffic Jam" made by EOShadows and Kn0cktane! You are a person driving to work and you must find a way to make it in time by dodging, weaving and drifting through other cars and other obstacles! As you get to work each day you can choose between upgrade options which help you as the difficulty continues to rise.

Controls:

[WS] - accelerate and decelerate

[AD] - turn

[Shift] - drifting

Edits: uploaded changes to the html game that had been made before the game jam time limit but we forgot to commit them and include them in the uploaded game.
